articles.title: Ukraine war: Thousands of civilians trapped in Severodonetsk
articles.description: Food and water are running out for the women and children still there, a UN official tells the BBC.
articles.content:

articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: FDA advisers vote yes to Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine for kids 5 and under in U.S. | CBC News
articles.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration's outside vaccine advisers have voted to authorize Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine for children between six months and five years of age. They will vote separately on a similar submission from Pfizer this afternoon.
articles.content:
The U.S. Food and Drug Administration's outside vaccine advisers have voted unanimously to authorize Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine for children between six months and five years of age.
